title: I want to change my GCash MPIN
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)

Learn how to change your GCash MPIN. To keep your account safe, **change your GCash MPIN every 3 months.**

Note:

Your MPIN is different from your GCash Card PIN. To learn how to reset your GCash Card MPIN, [click here](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30286846758297-How-do-I-reset-my-GCash-VISA-Mastercard-PIN).

Learn how to change your MPIN below:

1\. On your GCash homepage, tap **Profile** \> **Settings**

2\. Tap **Change MPIN**

3\. Enter your current MPIN

4\. Set and verify your new MPIN then tap **Submit**

**![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/35221433015193)**

You will be led to a page that confirms the change of your MPIN.

### Need more Help?

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles.
